trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around July 6th 2008
Summary: Silver ball bearing, several miles in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying on a lawn chair in the backyard in Windham NH. It was a beautiful day, the sky was a deep blue and the clouds were few and far between. I was staring up in the sky specifically looking for any odd craft like objects which I have done many times before. I could see typical airplanes fly by periodically. All of a sudden my eyes caught the object, it was like a small silver ball bearing, it wasnt moving. It was very high in the sky, further than any of the planes that I saw. It must of been several miles up. It didnt move at all. I looked around to see if there were any stars out but it was the middle of tha day, there were no stars. I could see regular airplanes and they were moving, this object was not. Maybe it was a satelite? Anyway, i watched it for about 10 minutes. Some clouds came by and covered the object, when the clouds disappeared it was gone. I layed there and look for it for another 15 to 20 minutes. It was gone. Then after about 20 minutes it reappeared just a little further south east. It stayed in the sky for several minutes and then was covered by clouds, I didnt see it again.
